user.title: Road Speed Limits
user.description: Configure the Road Speed Limits integration. Provide separate sensors for Latitude and Longitude. API keys for TomTom and HERE Maps should be configured in secrets.yaml.

data_description.latitude_entity: Select the sensor entity that provides latitude.
data_description.longitude_entity: Select the sensor entity that provides longitude.
data_description.data_source: Choose the data source for speed limit information. OpenStreetMap is free. TomTom and HERE require API keys.
data_description.unit: Select the unit for displaying speed limits.
data_description.min_update_distance: Distance moved required to wake up the polling loop.
data_description.min_update_time: If no movement occurs for this many seconds, polling will stop to save API calls.
data_description.speed_entity: Entity providing vehicle speed in km/h. Used to bypass cache when moving fast.
data_description.tomtom_api_key: Enter your TomTom API key here if you selected TomTom as a data source or want to use it as a fallback.
data_description.here_api_key: Enter your HERE API key here if you selected HERE Maps as a data source or want to use it as a fallback.

error.invalid_entity: One or more entities not found. Please check the entity IDs.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
